QuestData.Title: They Rely on Numbers
QuestData.Description: Thunderlord spend their days training to hunt as a team, but as individuals they are weak. Their only strength is in numbers.$b$bSo... to win, we must cull their numbers.$b$bAs we move up through the Daggermaw Ravine, slay any Thunderlord who stand in your way, and their clan will be made the weaker for it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Thunderlord at Daggermaw Ravine in Frostfire Ridge.
